ygData.subject: Re: Dual Wield
ygData.msgSnippet: No that s not true they do same damage with any weapon at least with piercing weapons at high levels. However you will find your pet hitting a lot faster if
ygData.messageBody:
No that's not true they do same damage with any weapon at least with
piercing weapons at high levels. However you will find your pet hitting a
lot faster if you give him some piercing weapons which gnerally have a fast
dly anyway.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 43rd Circle

-----Original Message-----
From: Dicey <dicey@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, October 24, 1999 10:45 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Dual Wield


>From: dicey@... (Dicey)

weapon
